title: [Large-scale] Student-centered Science Learning Module Design: Application of the RASE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science concepts comprehension and fundamental digital device application skills
context.additional_context: Aims to foster practical understanding of scientific concepts, emphasizing self-directed inquiry through peer collaboration and digital tool utilization.

learning_goals: Learners can design science learning activities using the four elements of the RASE model.
Learners can analyze digital resources and generate conceptual models for applying scientific concepts.
Learners can improve learning outcomes through peer feedback and formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
